## Checklist

### For New Skills

- [ ] Created skill in `.claude/skills/[skill-name]/`
- [ ] SKILL.md includes all required sections
- [ ] SKILL.md is under 500 lines
- [ ] Description is clear and specific
- [ ] Instructions are actionable
- [ ] Includes "When to Use This Skill" section
- [ ] Tested with at least one compatible IDE
- [ ] Follows naming conventions

### For All Contributions

- [ ] No linting errors
- [ ] No typos or grammar issues
- [ ] Follows existing code/documentation style
- [ ] Updated README.md if necessary
- [ ] Self-reviewed the changes
